alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 1:48PM EDT until September 07 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 147 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Bloomfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Millersburg, Newport, Duncannon, New Bloomfield, New Buffalo, Shermansdale and Halifax. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
